title: How to Get Log Stakes in Animal Crossing: New Horizons

steps.title: Launch your island in Animal Crossing: New Horizons.
steps.content: Launch your island in Animal Crossing: New Horizons . This is a Nintendo Switch exclusive game that can be played online with friends.

steps.title: Obtain the Log Stakes recipe.
steps.content: Obtain the Log Stakes recipe. You can get the recipe from Tom Nook in the early stages of the game, or from Smug-type villagers at random. [1] X Research source To check if you have the recipe, open the NookPhone and select DIY Recipes+ . This is the same section you can view recipes you can cook . The Log Stakes will be in the Housewares section and have a brown card background.

steps.title: Obtain three (3) wood.
steps.content: Obtain three (3) wood. The Log Stakes is an item that is made from crafting three (3) wood. You'll need regular wood, not hardwood or softwood. Use an axe to chop down any tree (except bamboo) to find wood.

steps.title: Use a workbench to craft.
steps.content: Use a workbench to craft. If you don't already have a workbench, you can use Tom Nook's workbench inside of Resident Services. Once crafted, you can customize it or place it on your island. Don't forget you can use the Terraforming app to reshape your island as needed. When you interact with a workbench, select Let's craft! Find the Log Stakes recipe card. Select Craft it! Select Let's do it!

steps.title: Customize the Log Stakes (optional).
steps.content: Customize the Log Stakes (optional). You must have a Customization kit , which is available for purchase at Nook's Cranny. Currently, the Log Stakes has four variations: dark wood (default), orange wood, white wood, and white birch. By customizing items to your exact tastes, you're working towards your own perfect island . When you interact with a workbench, select Customize something. Select the Log Stakes in your inventory. Select a variation. Select Customize! Select Yeah!
